Movement.description: These actions move or turn the Replicant.

Arm Articulation.description: These actions move and bend the joints of the Replicant's arms.

Object Interaction.description: These actions involve interaction with other objects, e.g. grasping or dropping.

Head.description: These actions rotate the Replicant's head.

Animation.description: These actions play arbitrary humanoid animations.
